info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 11:45AM PDT until July 31 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 1145 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated numerous isolated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Henderson, Anthem, Green Valley, Enterprise, Paradise, Seven Hills, Silverado Ranch, Henderson Executive Airport and Black Mtn. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
